name: By the Stars
description:
Welcome, outworlders! Thanks for checking out this demo.

By the Stars is an action adventure game with elements of RPG and roguelite in the cosmo-fantasy setting! Go on adventure, explore, solve puzzles, and pew-pew-pew (adventure will be available a little bit later)

If you enjoyed this demo, follow me on social media!

instagram - https://www.instagram.com/elvenrogue 

twitter - https://twitter.com/elvenrogue1

code, design, art and sound by me.

music by https://www.instagram.com/kremar_n_ko
